name: Melissa
text: Camp K12 has helped Kevin come out of his shell and enabled him to express everything better.

name: Sarah
text: The curriculum is personalized for Cade’s specific interests. Camp K12 is the first coding platform that is able to hold my son’s attention.

name: Jason
text: Jason is homeschooled and is now developing his programming prowess with Camp K12.

name: Mrs. Jain
text: The course helped Adi get accepted into the IT club of his school, and he has been asked by his teachers to build a website for the school.
